title: NewPath Learning - 24-6017 Rock Cycle Bingo Game, Grade 5-9
features: Fun and flexible means to master key earth science topics
Enough materials for up to 30 students
Perfect means to introduce or review a key topic
Printed on durable stock for years of use
description: NewPath Learning rock cycle bingo game is an engaging and effective addition to your earth science curriculum. Students will gain a complete understanding of the rock cycle and the many powerful forces at work in creating and recreating rocks. The 75 review cards feature a color photograph on one side along with information on the geologic processes involved in the weathering, transport, formation and reformation of sedimentary, igneous and metamorphic rocks. The back of the card includes a question, challenge or learning statement. In addition to the review cards, each game includes 30 full-color bingo cards, 300 markers and a comprehensive teacher's guide. Printed in color on durable, heavy cardstock, the cards can also be used as standalone flash cards for independent study or review. Grade 5,6,7,8 and high school. Class/home pack. Academic standard: California, Florida, National, New York, Texas.

title: National Geographic Rock Bingo Educational STEM Game
